attributes.action: Change A-Level certificates to recognise those who acheived high A's at A-Level to the new A*'s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We do not wish to be discriminated against in forthcoming employment, nor do we wish to be known ,as those similar to 'O-level' in relation to GCSE's, as holding 'lesser' qualifications after working arduously for our grades. We do not wish to be 'left behind' in the face of re- classification. 

In this way,we call for new certificates, in the event of re- classification to 'A*' level A- levels, as proposed by Oxford University.
